episodes.title: WATCH OUT FOR SO CALLED "CULT EXPERTS" | #antimlm
episodes.description:
This is alarming to me - seeing someone who specializes in cults being hired by MLMs?!  And then goes on to say they are "bad MLMs" out there that are cults, but not the one I consulted for!  They were good guys!  This is absolutely wild to me that this interview is from 2 years ago. I have to wonder how many people this individual has harmed with his so called cult expert status. 

Original video from fellow YouTube creator: 
@erichunley 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bBWRx1anhgM

episodes.title: The Cults of MLMs and Scientology - with Chris Shelton MSc
WHY ARE MLMS & HIGH CONTROL GROUPS EVEN LEGAL?! #antimlm
episodes.description:
From Susan's website:

"I left NXIVM in 2009, but it wasn't until almost two decades, in 2017, it burned to the ground. 

Earlier, the NYS AG  was working with us. They collected a lot of frickin info from us & poof; they were gone.

I was sued by NXIVM, filing over 200 fake claims against me

I won their bogus lawsuit against me, representing myself against seven of their lawyers. 

I have lots of battle scars from being in the NXIVM Cult and the battle to take them down after leaving."

https://susandones.com/

Twitter: @SusanDones
Instagram: susandones456

++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

Report fraud to Competition Bureau Canada:
https://www.competitionbureau.gc.ca/eic/site/cb-bc.nsf/frm-eng/GH%C3%89T-7TDNA5

Report false/misleading ads and Facebook and IG posts:
https://truthinadvertising.org/

Report fraud to the FTC:
https://reportfraud.ftc.gov/#/

episodes.title: His Dad Has Been in Amway for 20+ Years...#antimlm
episodes.description: Glenn's Dad has been in Amway for more than 20 years. Glenn is an antimlm advocate, his YouTube channel is @mlmisfraud305

episodes.title: "WORKING FOR AN MLM RUINED SOCIAL MEDIA FOR ME" - EMMA'S STORY #antimlm
episodes.description:
This is Emma's story.  I hope hearing her story in her words helps you piece more of your experience together... or perhaps gives you insight as to what many MLM survivors experience.  

As always, thank you for watching. 

Julie xo

episodes.title: "I will never sacrifice the present for the future" - Part 3 Interview @gurunischan  #antimlm
episodes.description:
